label: Whispering Knights
column5: The Whispering Knights is a Neolithic portal dolmen burial chamber
column6: predating the nearby Rollright Stone Circle by over a millennium
column7: with its striking upright stones once forming a dramatic
column8: table-like structure. Steeped in legend and history
column9: the monument is believed to have housed the remains of multiple individuals and was venerated for centuries
column10: with its name derived from a local myth of treacherous knights turned to stone by a witch.
